challenges.name: Even Odd
challenges.shortDescription: Make a script to print 20 numbers, showing either 'Even' or 'Odd' alongside.
challenges.fullDescription: Print 20 numbers to the Output using 'print()', in ascending order from 1-20 (1,2...20). To the right of each printed number should be a dash, followed by either 'Even' or 'Odd' You must calculate if a number is even/odd; you may not simply alternate between the two in the loop.
requirements: State if each number is 'Even' or 'Odd'
challenges.hint: A number is even if it is divisible by 2 with no remainder. Use the modulus operator for this; %.
